VARDESC: Did the child's school/preschool/daycare close because of the COVID-19 outbreak?
column19: 3 = The child is not enrolled in any school/preschool/daycare

VARDESC: Does the child usually receive free meals at school/preschool/daycare?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did the child's school/preschool/daycare close because of the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has the child's school/preschool/daycare offered meals during the closure from COVID-19?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Does the child usually receive free meals at school/preschool/daycare?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has the child been able to get the school-provided meals during the COVID-19 associated closure?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Has the child's school/preschool/daycare offered meals during the closure from COVID-19?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has the child's school/preschool/daycare offered online learning while closed?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did the child's school/preschool/daycare close because of the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has the child's school/preschool/daycare provided either of the following to support online learning? Free home internet access
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Has the child's school/preschool/daycare offered online learning while closed?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Has the child's school/preschool/daycare provided either of the following to support online learning? Free computer or tablet
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Has the child's school/preschool/daycare offered online learning while closed?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: What type of internet access does the child have at home? (Mark all that apply)
column21: 3 = Smartphone not connected to WiFi network at home (e.g., use cellular, LTE, mobile hotspot, neighbor's WiFi)
column22: 4 = The child does not have internet access at home

VARDESC: Did the child have high-speed broadband internet access at home prior to March 1, 2020?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What type of internet access does the child have at home?' = 'High-speed broadband internet ('WiFi') (e.g. DSL, cable, fiber optic)'
